materials.raw_text:
Lithium Phosphate (Li3PO4) - 40 g 
 Lead (Pb) - 200 g 
 Samarium (Sm) - 280 g 
 Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3) - 50 g 
 Calcium Carbonate (CaCO3) - 30 g

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry ceramic or glass container, combine Lithium Phosphate, Lithium Carbonate, and Calcium Carbonate. 
 3. Gradually add Lead and Samarium to the mixture while continuously stirring to ensure even distribution. 
 4. Mix thoroughly until a homogeneous mixture is obtained.
